meanings.definition: A luxury seating area at a sports stadium or arena.
meanings.sent1: The skyboxes at the stadium have comfy seats and great views.
meanings.sent2: Fans enjoy watching the game from the skyboxes high above.
meanings.sent3: The skyboxes were so fancy, they even had mini-fridges!
meanings.sent4: From the skyboxes, the view of the field was like looking through a magic window.
meanings.sent5: The skyboxes made the game experience feel like a dream.

meanings.definition: A private entertainment suite located high above the main seating area.
meanings.sent1: In the skyboxes, guests can enjoy the event in privacy.
meanings.sent2: Celebrities often watch concerts from the exclusive skyboxes.
meanings.sent3: The skyboxes felt like a secret hideout for the VIP guests.
meanings.sent4: From the skyboxes, the music sounded like it was floating in the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The skyboxes offered a bird's-eye view of the stage.

meanings.definition: A section of a building or structure that offers panoramic views of the surrounding area.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant's skyboxes provide a stunning view of the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: Tourists love visiting the observation deck with its skyboxes.
meanings.sent3: The skyboxes on the tower made it feel like being on top of the world.
meanings.sent4: From the skyboxes, you could see the entire landscape spread out below.
meanings.sent5: The skyboxes gave a breathtaking glimpse of the world below.
